module.p:
Derived verbs are verbs which have been formed from adjectives or nouns, typically by addition of a suffix eg.
geal adj. white → gealaich vb. whiten
cuimhne fem. memory → cuimhnich vb. remember
Is e gnìomhairean a tha ann an gnìomhairean bunaichte, a tha air air an cruthachadh à buadhairean no ainmearan, gu cumanta le iar-leasachan.
